casebody.data:
PINE
v.
WAL-MART ASSOCIATES, INC. # 1552, et al. 335A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 22, 2018 Holly M. Stott, Attorney at Law, M. Duane Jones, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Linda Stephens, Attorney at Law, for Wal-Mart Associates, Inc. # 1552, et al. David A. Shelby, Attorney at Law, Salisbury, for Pine, Patricia. Vernon Sumwalt, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for N.C. Advocates for Justice.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of January 2018 by North Carolina Advocates for Justice for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of January 2018."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
